title: Vacation Recap, Church Complaints, Black Girl Magic, NBA Free Agency and more.
itunes:title: Vacation Recap, Church Complaints, Black Girl Magic, NBA Free Agency and more.
description:
Welcome back everybody and Happy Monday to you and yours!  We get to hear everyone's vacation recap.  Church Complaints has 2 Canes listening party and more.  Stevie Wonder will get a kidney transplant and actor Cameron Boyce passes at age 20.  The young 15 year old tennis sensation Coco Gauff leaves her mark at Wimbledon and defeats her idol Venus Williams.  Team USA wins the World Cup.  This is the ladies 4th time at the top!  Junior has NBA talk and goes over free agency, KD, The Clippers and more.  What are old school ways of having summer fun that kids today have no idea about.  This predates toys.  Are there black mermaids?  Halle Bailey baby!!!  As a nice review of the morning, the crew will tell you what they learned today and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
